flawed_nl_solution:
The bus started with 50 people - 15 who got off at the first stop = <<50-15=35>>35 people on the bus.
At the second stop, 35 people on the bus - 8 who got off = <<35-8=27>>27 people.
Then there were 27 people + 2 who got on = <<27+2=33>>33 people on the bus.
At the third stop, 33 people on the bus - 4 who got off = <<33-4=29>>29 people on the bus.
Then there were 29 people on the bus + 3 who got on = <<29+3=32>>32 people on the bus.
#### 32

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 29, not 33. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
